articles.title: Asian esports players describe 'unspeakable and terrifying' racism and harassment - IOL
articles.description: In a viral video with over 300 000 views since it was posted to Twitter on Tuesday, professional esports player Lee ’Fearless’ Eui-seok denounced hateful, anti-Asian acts he has experienced since coming to the United States.
articles.content:
By The Washington Post4h ago
By Shannon Liao 
"They call us Chinese, then harass us. The racism here is unspeakable."
